description:
Legendary fighters from the CRESTA series are back and yours to maneuver as you try and stop Mega Zoferâ€™s conquest of the solar system.

Installing this DLC will add the new Wing Galiber II fighter to the base game.
- This fighter cannot be used in Dramatic Mode included in the SOL CRESTA Dramatic DLC.
- Check the in-game manual for the Wing Galiber II controls.
- CR47, Wing Galiber, and Wing Galiber II DLC value bundle is also available for purchase. Be careful with duplicate purchases.

Wing Galiber II
The main fighter from Terra Cresta II: Mandler no Gyakushuu, making its long-awaited return to battle. In addition to its Formation Attack and the legendary Firebird Attack, numerous special attacks have been carefully revived, such as Fire Formation, Formation Shot, and P.R.B. (Phoenix Rolling Bomber). 

Wing Galiber II can also be used for score rankings in Caravan Mode.
The icon of the fighter used will be now be recorded along with your high score. 
Challenge yourself and see how much performance you can bring out of this legendary fighter, which is different to the Yamato fighters in many ways.
name: SOL CRESTA "Wing Galiber II" DLC
